thread.title: Why the NFL Stopped Seeing Gambling as a Threat—and Started to See a Windfall

author: Andrew Beaton
title: Why the NFL Stopped Seeing Gambling as a Threat—and Started to See a Windfall
text:
For decades, the NFL’s high-level conversations about legalizing sports betting centered only on how problematic it would be. Now that the reality of legal wagering is here, the league is suddenly shifting its focus to how gambling can help stanch the erosion of its audience—and grow its sport to even greater heights.
The NFL was long resolute in its belief that legal sports gambling would be a threat to its integrity, even as the NBA and others warmed to the idea.
